query.select: select daydate as daydate, publisher_id as publisher_id, advertiser_id as advertiser_id, campaign_id as campaign_id, client_id as client_id, device_name as device_name, country as country, carrier_name as carrier_name, mobile_model as mobile_model, region_code as region_code, user_agent as user_agent from clicks_logs <% if( p.sdate && p.edate ) { %> where daydate between <%= p.escape('sdate') %> and <%= p.escape('edate') %> <% } %> order by <%= p.orderBy %> <%= p.dir %>
